section.name: Bloomreach XM - Document Translation Picker
section.p: The document translation picker project provides a plugin to the CMS interface. It enables editors to pick existing documents as a translation for a document.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: This plugin adds a menu item to the 'document' item in the toolbar. A CMS user can use it to open a dialog and select existing documents in translated folders. These documents will get the same, newly created, translationID as the current document.
